org.apache.commons.dbcp
Class AbstractMBeanTest

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.dbcp.AbstractMBeanTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
ManagedBasicDataSourceTest
public abstract class AbstractMBeanTest
extends Object

Helper class for MBean tests.

Opens a connection on the platform MBean server the extending class can use with {#getMBeanServerConnection}.

Since:
0.2
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud

Method Detail

getMBeanServerConnection

protected MBeanServerConnection getMBeanServerConnection()
Get the MBeanServerConnection on the MBean server used for tests.

Returns:
an alive connection the platform MBean server.

prepareMBeanServerConnection

public void prepareMBeanServerConnection()
                                  throws IOException
Open a connection on the platform MBean server before tests.

Throws:
IOException - if the connection could not be opened.

closeMBeanServerConnection

public void closeMBeanServerConnection()
                                throws IOException
Close the connection on the MBean server.

Throws:
IOException - if an error occured while closing the connection.
